analysis.description:
Minewar.lottery (/unique_chucks/5/0x781878427cf56c8ab7745ca02910a801503c6ecc.sol#193-209) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- administrator.transfer(SafeMath.div(SafeMath.mul(this.balance,5),100)) (/unique_chucks/5/0x781878427cf56c8ab7745ca02910a801503c6ecc.sol#196-197)

Minewar.becomeSponsor (/unique_chucks/5/0x781878427cf56c8ab7745ca02910a801503c6ecc.sol#212-218) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- sponsor.transfer(getCurrentPrice(sponsorLevel)) (/unique_chucks/5/0x781878427cf56c8ab7745ca02910a801503c6ecc.sol#215-216)

Minewar.hasBooster (/unique_chucks/5/0x781878427cf56c8ab7745ca02910a801503c6ecc.sol#356-364) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- boostData[revert_i].owner == addr

Minewar.hasBooster (/unique_chucks/5/0x781878427cf56c8ab7745ca02910a801503c6ecc.sol#356-364) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- boostData[revert_i].owner == addr
Minewar.isCurrentRound (/unique_chucks/5/0x781878427cf56c8ab7745ca02910a801503c6ecc.sol#121-124) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(players[msg.sender].round == round)
	- require(bool)(players[msg.sender].round == round)

Minewar.lottery has external calls inside a loop:
	- rankList[idx].transfer(SafeMath.div(SafeMath.mul(balance,profit[idx]),100)) (/unique_chucks/5/0x781878427cf56c8ab7745ca02910a801503c6ecc.sol#203-207)

Minewar.upgrade has external calls inside a loop:
	- rankList[idx].transfer(SafeMath.div(SafeMath.mul(balance,profit[idx]),100)) (/unique_chucks/5/0x781878427cf56c8ab7745ca02910a801503c6ecc.sol#558-559)

Minewar.BASE_PRICE should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0x781878427cf56c8ab7745ca02910a801503c6ecc.sol#58-59)
Minewar.CRTSTAL_MINING_PERIOD should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0x781878427cf56c8ab7745ca02910a801503c6ecc.sol#54)
Minewar.HALF_TIME should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0x781878427cf56c8ab7745ca02910a801503c6ecc.sol#56-57)
Minewar.MINIMUM_LIMIT_SELL should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0x781878427cf56c8ab7745ca02910a801503c6ecc.sol#61)
Minewar.RANK_LIST_LIMIT should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0x781878427cf56c8ab7745ca02910a801503c6ecc.sol#59-60)
Minewar.ROUND_TIME should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0x781878427cf56c8ab7745ca02910a801503c6ecc.sol#57-58)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/5/0x781878427cf56c8ab7745ca02910a801503c6ecc.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.2 (/unique_chucks/5/0x781878427cf56c8ab7745ca02910a801503c6ecc.sol#1): it allows old versions
